subject: Breeders' Cup (Horse Race)
Allergies
lead_paragraph: An altercation between jockeys Calvin Borel and Javier Castellano after the opening race took center stage at Churchill Downs, while filly Life at Ten may have suffered an allergic reaction.
snippet: An altercation between jockeys Calvin Borel and Javier Castellano after the opening race took center stage at Churchill Downs, while filly Life at Ten may have suffered an allergic reaction.
